text: Tum mein say unn logon say jo eman laye hain aur nek aemaal kiye hain Allah Taalaa wada farma chuka hai kay unhen zaroor zamin mein khalifa banaye ga jaisay kay unn logon ko khalifa banaya tha jo inn say pehlay thay aur yaqeenan inn kay liye inn kay iss deen ko mazbooti kay sath mohkum ker kay jama dey ga jissay unn kay liye woh pasand farma chuka hai aur inn kay iss khof-o-khatar ko woh aman-o-amaan mein badal dey ga woh meri ibadat keren gay meray sath kissi ko bhi shareek na therayen gay. Iss kay baad bhi jo log na-shukri aur kufur keren yaqeenan fasiq hain
